translations: v.哀叹，哀鸣；发牢骚，抱怨；嘎嘎响（whine 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: 'I want to go home,' whined Toby.
sentences.translation: “我要回家。”托比哼哼唧唧地说。

sentences.sentence: The dog whined and scratched at the door.
Like one of the kids, he whined and pouted when he did not get what he wanted.
sentences.translation: 他若没有得到他想要的，就会像孩子一般又是哼唧又是撅嘴。
